Back to Alexander Scriabin

Alexander Scriabin

Sonata in E-flat minor, WoO 19

1887–1889

[IMSLP]

Total duration: 18'

  • 1.
  • 2.
  • 3.

Recommended editions

  • Collected Works (Muzyka/Jurgenson) · III/12 · Works of various genres without opus number / Unfinished works · ed. Valentina Rubtsova / Pavel Shatsky
  • Bärenreiter · BA 9616 · Sämtliche Klaviersonaten I · ed. Christoph Flamm
  • Könemann · K 262 · Individual Pieces · ed. Victor Ekimovsky [mov. 3]

1.

This movement was later revised as the allegro appassionato (op. 4).

Duration: 8'

Difficulty: 4

2.

The closing section of this movement is lost.

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 2.5

3.

Duration: 5'

Difficulty: 4
